content: bright stripes of vibrant color adorn this crochet scarf that makes you stand out in the crowd super saver stripes does all the colorwork as you crochet this easy-stitch pattern in any shades that bring out your personal style and with very few ends to weave in you ll be thrilled with how simple it is to craft an accessory with so much sassy style stand out in the crowd with this bright scarf super saver stripes does the color work for you as you crochet this easy-to-do stitch pattern
